product_name: Mountain House Beef Stew Pro-Pak - 2 Servings
long_description: A single serving of hearty beef stew with peas and carrots. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve; resealable foil pouch helps retain warmth. Compact vacuum pouch leaves more room in your pack and won't expand at high elevations. A quick, filling meal for camping or backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A single serving of hearty beef stew with peas and carrots.
